name: Blessed Blood (Aasimar)
summary: Your freshly spilled blood is sanctified, and ingesting it causes effects similar to those of holy water.
description:
Your freshly spilled blood is sanctified, and ingesting it causes effects similar to those of holy water. Whenever a fiend, undead, or creature with a weakness to good damage drinks your blood or deals piercing or slashing damage to you with jaws, fangs, or a similar attack, that creature takes 1d6 good damage. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Crafting checks to Craft holy water using your own blood as one of the ingredients.Traits

Aasimar: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.
